comment: We watch movies that were connected to assignments in the workbook; so you have to do the work. She is nice and she smile everyday. To the people who didn't like her, is because they are idiots, point blank! Test are easy.
She's really cool. She's sometimes a little late, but no one cares. Her tests are really easy, and she knows a lot about digital media production. I would for sure take her class.

She reads directly off her powerpoints, and they are posted for us online. Nothing ever interesting happens, and to be teaching communications is sad, because she is the worst at communicating with the class!!

She always comes to class with a smile! Although her class is fairly easy, I am actually learning a lot from it! She is very friendly and helpful. Put forth a little extra effor in the workbook assignments and you are sure to ace this course. If you are looking to off-set this semester with a less rigourous class, this is the one. AND SHES HOT!:)

She was an AWESOME professor! As a freshman, I had her one day a week and her teaching made the class go by really fast! Never had a boring day; we were given study guides for the tests; she dropped our lowest grade. Watched movies and had lots of group activities. Would definitely recommend her to anyone and would take any of her classes again!

Overall I thought the class was extremely easy. She give study guide for every test. She allowed us to drop our lowest test grade including the final. I made an A in the class with little work. We mainly watched movies and the Cosby show.
